steps.text: Open Settings and tap Network and internet or Connections.
steps.tts: Open Settings and tap Network and internet or Connections.

steps.text: Tap Wi‑Fi. Make sure the switch is On.
steps.tts: Tap Wi-Fi. Make sure the switch is On.

steps.text: Tap the name of your home or office network in the list.
steps.tts: Tap the name of your home or office network in the list.

steps.text: Enter the Wi‑Fi password if asked, then tap Connect. When it says Connected, you're done.
steps.tts: Enter the Wi-Fi password if asked, then tap Connect. When it says Connected, you're done.
